job1.title: Web Development Intern
job1.duties: Employed by the Marketing, Insights and Communication Creative Digital Team at the University of St. Thomas, my position responsibilities include: Work in various frameworks and functionality using HTML/CSS, Information Architecture, Quality Assurance, and marketing strategy & research (site audits, analytics, benchmarking).

job2.title: Research and Development Intern
job2.duties: Assigned to a project team tasked with providing support to end users through deployment of new technologies. Collaborated with a team of over 10 individuals to deploy usable software. Analyzed software output quantitatively and qualitatively to produce reports. Developed an efficient and effective workflow to test large data sets
